fullText: Nicole Scherzinger gives a thrilling, unhinged performance as Norma Desmond in this revival that finally makes Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical work as intended.
dtliExcerpt: Nicole Scherzinger gives a thrilling, unhinged performance as Norma Desmond in this revival that finally makes Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical work as intended.
showScoreExcerpt: Nicole Scherzinger gives a thrilling, unhinged performance as Norma Desmond in this revival that finally makes Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical work as intended.
nycTheatreExcerpt: "I can't help feeling that Lloyd's talent and that of his designers, let alone Scherzinger's, would be better lavished on better material."
